mng: down, downwards, below, lower, later, next (week etc), second (of two parts), to decline, to go down, to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc), measure word to show the frequency of an action

exm.mng: down, downwards, below, lower, later, next (week etc), second (of two parts), to decline, to go down, to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc), measure word to show the frequency of an action
that level or lower, that amount or less, the following
(used after a verb) give it a go, to do (sth for a bit to give it a try), one time, once, in a while, all of a sudden, all at once
to leave behind, to stay behind, to remain, to keep, not to let (sb) go

to come down, (after verb of motion, indicates motion down and towards us, also fig.), (indicates continuation from the past towards us), to be harvested (of crops), to be over (of a period of time), to go among the masses (said of leaders)
to accept, to take, next, following
land under heaven, the whole world, the whole of China, realm, rule
underneath, below, the underside, world of mortals, to descend to the world of mortals (of Gods)
to go down, to descend, to go on, to continue
